Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Precious historical small hotel on left bank St Germaine de Pres close to cafes shops and neighborhood feel Staff is personable garden area is lovely

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Just leave it as it is please
Positive_Review: This is a traditional small hotel in Paris in a fantastic position just off boulevard saint Germaine Intimate setting and caring staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: NOWHERE on the Booking com information on this hotel is it noted that the Junior Suite is THREE flights up a steep staircase with no elevator The hotel claims to have air conditioning but it was on only on the ground floor The staff kept saying it was broken and would be fixed but than changed their statement to say it wasn t on yet But it was on just not in the rooms We had to keep the windows open for air no fans and could see directly into the bedrooms and baths across the way And those guests could see into our room It was a most unpleasant stay It was our fifth time and our last Breakfast service was incredibly slow only one waiter for a full house so we had to sit at tables with used cloths and limited dishes and wait a very long time for coffee The cooked food was inedible The croissants were good bread not
Positive_Review: Our third room was adequate in size finally

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I liked the general atmosphere of the hotel at the heart of Saint Germain des Pres It is a kind of boutique hotel with green spaces inside situated of one of the narrow streets in the area Very close to main boulevard Plenty of shops and cafe restaurants nearby Very professional staff Rooms are not big but very comfortable with a modern bathroom Breakfast may seem expensive but food is very fresh and good

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff is very pleasant and helpful they went out of their way to provide us with directions restaurant suggestions and general travel plans Would highly recommend the Hotel Des Saints Peres

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room was small exceptionally hot I didn t feel it was great value for money although very nice The area while nice was quiet although only a 10 minute walk to some life As a young couple I would have preferred somewhere more vibrant
Positive_Review: Lovely bathroom very clean and great staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: the rooms could have been a little bigger there was hardly any room to store our suitcase
Positive_Review: The staff were charming and helpful and the rooms were beautifully appointed

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: It was wonderful We did not get the breakfast because we wanted to remain flexible and thought the price was high I m glad we made that decision however it looked very nice and it would have been nice to interact with the staff and other guests a bit more if we had
Positive_Review: Charming hotel lovely design great staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: My work laptop couldn t connect to the wifi because it had a pop up blocker installed which meant that I could not access my emails None of the staff knew how to help me with this and they were unable to connect me with someone who could help It made working in hotel impossible which was quite problematic given that this was a business trip In addition our first room has a ventilation problem in the bathroom which caused smells from other bathrooms in the building to waft into our bedroom When we raised the issue the staff kindly upgraded us to another room where the bathroom was very nice and had no smell Finally the shower door was not properly sealed and water seeped out during a shower causing a pool of water to form on the tile floor and soaking the bath mat Aside from those three issues which were relatively minor the room and the hotel was very nice
Positive_Review: The location was ideal It s close walking distance to everything in St Germain The street is quiet and the room doesn t get noise from outside The bedroom had sufficient closet space The staff were friendly and welcoming The bed was comfortable Overall a great choice of hotel for us despite a few minor drawbacks

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The team at the hotel are all friendly The hotel itself is old and quirky Each room is different and has antique furniture in it Most are away from the road so are very quiet It s simply lovely

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Room 101 is excellent it is much better than photos on booking com We had everything what required for family with little baby big room bath teapot quietness

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The building had character and history yet it wa brilliantly renovated aand comfortable The location could NOT be better right at St Germain des Pres yet it was quite and cozy The breakfast was well thought and the breads delicious

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: 10 minutes walk to the louvre complete continental breakfast buffet for 18 not cheap but affordable in paris bathroom very nice clean and big for parisienne hotels

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room I stayed in 301 was a little noisy and the heating was not running efficiently so it was a little chilly but I did not mind since I was staying for only a night
Positive_Review: Comfy bed clean well decorated and spacious room excellent location

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast area too small table chairs and visitors competing for space when outdoor area is closed
Positive_Review: The location is perfect hard to find a better place to stay in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I have stayed in this hotel many times and I cannot think of a complaint It combines a sense of tradition with contemporary service
Positive_Review: The bed was lovely the atmosphere of the hotel elegant and friendly the staffer charming and very helpful The location is ideal for the Musee D Orsay the Louvre The Luxembourg Gardens and the nice cafes and shops

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The hotel is less convenient for a business traveller who wants to work in his her room for more than a bit as the room I had was not very spacious and the desk space is very limited
Positive_Review: Very nice and cosy hotel on a perfect location with friendly staff and a perfect room with everything you will need

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: the exceptional location and atmosphere of the hotel gives you that very precious feeling of Paris our room was generously upgraded by the hotel and defineetly I m coming back the balnkets towels and bathrobes are of a unique comfort softness and quality loved it so much I could take them home

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The view Construction on the street The staff delayed booking a shuttle for me to the airport on the way home even though I asked about it early on Finally I was forced to take a taxi because the shuttle was not available Did the man at the front desk have an arrangement with the taxi service
Positive_Review: The room was great The bathroom spacious and immaculate The kettle for tea and the selection of teas was great The woman at the front desk was very helpful and booked theatre and concert tickets for me The croissants were delicious

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Loved it all We loved being in the centre of things
Positive_Review: We looked forward to your excellent breakfast buffet each morning Also the staff were extra friendly and helpful we really enjoyed our stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing that I can think of
Positive_Review: The location of this exceptional boutique hotel is superb and the staff was outstanding The breakfast was excellent with a good selection of pastries breads and of course croissant The room was modern and quiet with an excellent shower and very comfortable bed I would definitely stay here again and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: There was an issue with the room next door s key lock and it took a long while to fix it and it was very loud We unfortunately had been trying to nap
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful and cheerful And it was an adorable room that was very clean

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: no ambience in the bar no music in public areas and the quality of the bed sheets It should be 100 cotton The size of the TV for a renovated room is ridiculous
Positive_Review: The location and the staff always very polite and efficient The quality of the internet Breakfast was fair enough but no proper hot dishes The scrambled eggs were not soft in the shafing dish

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The painting decorating near my room smell of paint when I came back at end of day to rest o
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent Bed very comfortable above all very quiet good night sleep

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The air conditioning did not work on the first night The bed was saggy soft and not conformable Bathroom not well lit impossible to apply makeup The room smelt like smoke Breakfast was just average eggs hard Not a very good selection
Positive_Review: Perfect location Nicely decorated Rooms are small but well organized and appointed Great shower Friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff were very pleasant and accommodating with regards to information about Paris The room was very comfortable and the lounge and outside area very inviting to share a wine in

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: On check in we were told breakfast was served from 7 implying it was included Never once once price mentioned including when we sat down the next morning We were then charged 38 on check out for the 2 of us for a very basic buffet Poor experience in my mind and something to watch out for
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfasts only OK scrambled eggs dry croissants not always fresh well it is Paris
Positive_Review: Our room had plenty of space for hanging stuff and in the bathroom for toiletries etc Also in a hot month the a c was a bonus

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room we stayed in on the third floor was so small that two people could not even get dressed the same time also a very bad smell coming from bathroom
Positive_Review: Very helpful and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No sports channels on TV Too bad since it was during Euro 2016

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The bed could have been more comfortable

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Room was on the roadside of the hotel and too noisy for us Hotel staff we not very accommodating in shifting us as we were only staying one night

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Have been a client for many years and have never been disappointed The standards continue very high Congratulations to everyone inthe Hotel St P res Camilla Barretto

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: My husband and I have been staying at the Hotel Saints Peres for over 20 years It has always been good but we now think it is better than ever For anyone who is looking for a French experience this is the place to go It s location in St Germaine is excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Room service little bit disappointed when the food was arrived didn t expected the food served in a plastic container
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staffs at reception

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I have booked and paid for Superior Room but instead was given Chamber Room small room When I asked that my room supposed to be larger in size they informed that no rooms available basically take it or leave it Next day they refunded part payment Management is nice but night staff not really If you book in this hotel make sure that you call them and confirm that you are getting the room Otherwise you may not receive the room you paid for Otherwise the hotel is very nice
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Bed slightly uncomfortable and we miss the bowls of cafe au lait that were served at breakfast in the early days of our visits
Positive_Review: We have been coming to this hotel for over 30 years it has a great location nice French breakfast and pleasant under stated decor The staff is excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Everything Of course it doesn t come for cheap But personnel is extraordinarly pleasant breakfast is very good although I d prefer to have it included in room price which is the case in most of Europe but not in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing that I did not like actually

Hotel_Name: Hotel Des Saints Peres Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The hotel was very conveniently located for boulevard St Germain and was on a direct metro line from the Gare du Nord The room was very comfortable and attractively decorated
